auth.login_subtitle: Sign in to keep yourself and others safe.

loading.almost: Soon you'll see who can help nearby...
loading.title: Saving your details...
loading.subtitle: Just a moment ‚ú®

register.title: Register
register.subtitle: Sign up now to receive and provide help in emergency situations.
register.description: Where's Epi connects people with life-threatening allergies to EpiPen carriers nearby. Registration is quick and secure ‚Äî so you can be protected, all the time.

benefits.help: ‚ù§Ô∏è Help in the most critical moments

step1.title: Let's get started
step1.subtitle: Create your account to use all features

step2.title: Tell us about yourself
step2.subtitle: We need some personal details to complete your registration

step3.title: Do you have any allergies?
step3.subtitle: Do you have allergies? Choose from the list below.
step3.subtitle2: If you don't have allergies, you can simply continue.

step4.title: Who can we contact in case of emergency?
step4.subtitle: Add a contact who can help you in an emergency. This information will only be used when you need help - and it's secure and protected.

step5.title: We're finishing! Just choose a photo üì∏
step5.subtitle: It's time to choose a profile picture to accompany you in the app.
step5.subtitle2: You can also skip and add it later.

success.title: Glad you're here ‚Äì you're now part of us
success.subtitle:
From now on, you're never alone with your allergy.
The app connects people, injects confidence,
and provides immediate assistance in emergencies.

error.title: Something went wrong üòû
error.subtitle:
We couldn't complete the registration.
Please check your connection and try again.
